basic_info.description: I'm Soheil Ghorbani. I'm a curious person who wants to know everything so they call me Full-stack developer ðŸ˜€. Creative and detail-oriented Full Stack Developer with +6 years of experience building scalable web and mobile applications across various domains. Proficient in React, Flutter, Node.js, and NestJS, with hands-on experience in integrating AI-powered workflows and deploying production-grade systems on cloud platforms like Google Cloud and DigitalOcean. Strong track record of leading frontend development, collaborating on backend and AI components, and independently delivering full-stack solutions â€” including cross-platform apps and interactive mapping tools. Adaptable, self-driven, and experienced in remote, multicultural environments, based in Stockholm, Sweden.

experience.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
description: Designed, developed, and maintained the complete frontend for Resipt.AI, an AI-powered finance automation platform.
Implement a handy and user-friendly UI for reconciling credit cards. Implemented nodes creatiion based on dynamic real-time data and auto-positioning based on data.
Collaborated on designing and developing Resipt.AI backend services and AI integration, leveraging LLMs to extract data from receipts and reconcile financial transactions.
Implemented and maintained both infrastructures on Google Cloud Platform.
Automated PR tests and deployments using CI/CD pipelines over GitHub and GCP.
Decreased the development time using Claude Code and Cursor.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
description: Designed, built, and deployed the Bubbu App, a cross-platform audiobook app for children. Published Bubbu App on global stores like App Store and Google Play, and deployed backend service on Digital Ocean.
Built Adlar, a full-stack interactive mapping platform to document and explore renamed geographic locations, handling everything from data modeling to user interface design.
